meanings.definition: The quality or state of being truehearted.
meanings.sent1: Her trueheartednesses shone through when she stood by her friend in tough times.
meanings.sent2: His trueheartednesses towards his family was evident in the sacrifices he made for them.
meanings.sent3: The trueheartednesses of the puppy towards its owner was heartwarming to witness.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of deceit, her trueheartednesses was like a beacon of light.
meanings.sent5: The trueheartednesses of the old man towards his late wife was a testament to his enduring love.

meanings.definition: The loyalty or sincerity of a truehearted person.
meanings.sent1: The trueheartednesses of the soldier towards his country was unwavering.
meanings.sent2: She valued trueheartednesses in her friendships above all else.
meanings.sent3: The trueheartednesses of the cat towards its owner was evident in the way it purred contentedly in her lap.
meanings.sent4: His trueheartednesses was like a shield, protecting those he cared about from harm.
meanings.sent5: The trueheartednesses of the child towards his pet was pure and unconditional.
